title: Loops (for, while, do-while)
concept: This level builds mastery of loops in Java: for, while and do-while. Tasks include iteration, summation, counting, multiplication table, reversing numbers, factorial, prime checking and nested loops.

challenges.title: Print 1 to N
challenges.description: Read N and print numbers from 1 to N separated by spaces.
challenges.outputDescription: Numbers in one line separated by spaces.

challenges.title: Sum of First N Numbers
challenges.description: Read N and print sum from 1 to N.

challenges.title: Multiplication Table
challenges.description: Read N and print N×1, N×2, ..., N×10 each on new line.

challenges.title: Count Digits
challenges.description: Read integer n and print number of digits in it.

challenges.title: Reverse Number
challenges.description: Read number n and print the reversed number.

challenges.title: Factorial
Sum of Digits
challenges.description: Read n and print sum of its digits.

challenges.title: Prime or Not
challenges.description: Read n and print Yes if prime else No.

challenges.title: Fibonacci N Terms
challenges.description: Read N and print first N Fibonacci numbers separated by spaces (0 1 1 2 3 5 ...).
challenges.outputDescription: N Fibonacci numbers separated by space.

challenges.title: Star Pattern
challenges.description:
Read N and print a left triangle pattern:
*
**
***
.... (N rows)
